name: codeceptjs-explore
description: An experimental testing framework for Peregrine-CMS

scripts.docker-test: docker run --net=host -v `pwd`:/tests -w /tests --rm peregrinecms/e2e-tests sh -c 'rm -rf node_modules && npm i --save-dev && mkdir -p output; xvfb-run -s ":99 -auth /tmp/xvfb.auth -ac -screen 0 1920x1080x24" ffmpeg -y -f x11grab -video_size 1920x1080 -i :99 -codec:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p  -draw_mouse 0 -r 12 -loglevel panic output/video.mp4& DISPLAY=:99 npx codeceptjs run --steps; killall ffmpeg; sleep 5'

author: Gaston Gonzalez
